alert.note: Alert for Hodgeman (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 14 at 6:06PM CDT until May 15 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM CDT FOR EAST CENTRAL HODGEMAN...SOUTHWESTERN PAWNEE AND NORTHWESTERN EDWARDS COUNTIES... At 606 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles southeast of Gray, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Kinsley. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
